classes.title: Learn to Knit
dates.description: This class is for anyone who is new to knitting; we will cover casting on, basic knit & purl stitches & casting off. The project will be a dishcloth.

dates.title: Learn to Crochet
dates.description: This class is for those just wanting to learn how to crochet; we will cover beginning chain, foundation row, single, double & treble crochet. Project will be a dishcloth.

dates.title: Selbu Modern Hat
dates.description: A lovely charted hat using 2 contrasting colours.  Worked in Fresco yarn to create a soft hat with a defined colour pattern.
dates.note: you must pickup pattern & yarns and have the hat band knitted prior to first class
dates.prerequisites: ability to knit & purl, know how to knit in the round on 4 needles. Hat band to be cast on & knitted prior to first class.
dates.supplies: 2 colours of Fresco yarn, (5)needles - sizes 2.0mm & 2.75mm, pattern is free with class

dates.title: Beginner Crosstitch
dates.description: A great class for people who have always wanted to learn cross-stitch.  Covers materials, starting to stitch, floss, outlining & finishing.
dates.supplies: a small kit with aida cloth, needle, floss & hoop is included in class fee

dates.title: Brioche Stitch
dates.description: Come & learn something new for your knitting. An interesting twist to regular knit stitches.
dates.prerequisites: be able to knit & purl and cast on
dates.supplies: set of needles (or circular) with appropriate yarn or

dates.title: Repairs, mending & sewing together
dates.description: Learn how to repair holes in garments, overstitch, and sew a garment together properly.
dates.prerequisites: 4 squares(4"x4") knitted in stocking stitch. Use some old yarn that is nothing particular as we will be cutting a hole in one of the pieces and practicing stitching others together.
dates.supplies: needles - about 5mm size & corresponding yarn (worsted weight), (4) 4x4 squares need to be knitted before the start of class

dates.title: Double-sided Knitting
dates.description: Something new to learn! Make a single garment & have each side be the reverse image of the other.
dates.prerequisites: know how to cast on, knit and purl, and cast off
dates.supplies: 1 set of needles(or a circular) 4.0 to 5.0mm in size. Corresponding yarn of 2 different colours
